pages.text: Surviving doomsday isn't child's play; the situations you encounter here are far more complex than a little forest outing for a scout camp. There's no tuna sandwich or Scout cookies around here. Having a warm meal and getting a good night's sleep is already a luxury. The injuries you sustain might be much more

dramatic than just twisting an ankle. When dealing with more severe wounds, mere bandages won't cut it â€“ that's when you need a proper medical first aid kit. Don't complain about it taking up space; it could be a lifesaver!
